name: smoff_parametric_sweep
description: 100 Simulations, varying inlet temperature and delta-T

RandomForest._comments: If downsamples are specified here, then they will override the parent values

param_grid._comments: max_depth - default is None, max_features - default is p/3, min_samples_leaf - default is 1, min_samples_split - default is 2, n_estimators - default is 10

base_fit_params._comments: These can take on python eval commands, see n_jobs as example.

SVR._comments: If downsamples are specified here, then they will override the parent values

param_grid._comments: gamma - default is 1/n_features, C - default is 1
